rows.label: bf05270100_0010
rows.name: Hey, relax. You'll give yourself wrinkles.

rows.label: bf05270100_0020
rows.name: A Driver and Blade are one in body and soul.

rows.label: bf05270100_0030
rows.name:
It was you who told me that.
Well, the other you, I mean.

rows.label: bf05270100_0040
rows.name: You mean Hikari-chan?

rows.label: bf05270100_0050
rows.name:
Of course, it was five hundred years ago,
so perhaps you have forgotten.

rows.label: bf05270100_0060
rows.name: (Oh! I do remember saying that!)

rows.label: bf05270100_0070
rows.name:
(So it's true?
But how could she possibly remember...)

rows.label: bf05270100_0080
rows.name:
...You're wondering how I could remember
words from so long ago?

rows.label: bf05270100_0090
rows.name: What's this?

rows.label: bf05270100_0100
rows.name: You could call it a diary, I suppose.

rows.label: bf05270100_0110
rows.name:
It contains details about my past lives.
It's the only way I have to remember.

rows.label: bf05270100_0120
rows.name:
When we return to the Core Crystal, our minds are
wiped clean of all memories.

rows.label: bf05270100_0130
rows.name: Though a Blade's life is eternal...

rows.label: bf05270100_0140
rows.name:
Our effective lifespans as individuals
are far shorter than a human's.

rows.label: bf05270100_0150
rows.name:
You know, it's not just me.
A lot of Blades try to preserve their memories in journals like this one.

rows.label: bf05270100_0160
rows.name: ...Even though it's often futile.

rows.label: bf05270100_0170
rows.name: After all, a Core Crystal cannot protect a diary.

rows.label: bf05270100_0180
rows.name:
Usually, the volume is lost to us,
along with our memories.

rows.label: bf05270100_0190
rows.name:
I'm fortunate amongst Blades. I'm passed down as an
imperial treasure, and recorded in official chronicles.

rows.label: bf05270100_0200
rows.name: Er, Kagutsuchi...?

rows.label: bf05270100_0210
rows.name:
I don't know where your true intentions lie.
I can only make an educated guess.

rows.label: bf05270100_0220
rows.name: But Rex... He is your Driver.

rows.label: bf05270100_0230
rows.name:
If you truly trust him, I would
advise you tell him everything.

rows.label: bf05270100_0240
rows.name: If you can't do that even for him...

rows.label: bf05270100_0250
rows.name: You shouldn't be his Blade at all.

rows.label: bf05270100_0260
rows.name: I just...

rows.label: bf05270100_0270
rows.name: If you care about him, it's even more important.

rows.label: bf05270100_0280
rows.name:
I know what it's like to be afraid of rejection.
I really do.

rows.label: bf05270100_0290
rows.name: But...if you don't tell him now...

rows.label: bf05270100_0300
rows.name:
...you're just storing up pain for later,
not making it easier.

rows.label: bf05270100_0310
rows.name:
The way you say that...
You really do see right through me.

rows.label: bf05270100_0320
rows.name: Well. We go back a long way, as you recall.

rows.label: bf05270100_0330
rows.name: And we're both Blades, after all.
